name: Paid Internships
description: Get paid to work and learn! Enterprise for Youth’s internship program is an opportunity to explore careers, develop workplace skills, and make connections through diverse internship experiences.
fullDescription: Get paid to work and learn! Enterprise for Youth’s internship program is an opportunity to explore careers, develop workplace skills, and make connections through diverse internship experiences.
whatTheyOffer: Get paid to work and learn! Enterprise for Youth’s internship program is an opportunity to explore careers, develop workplace skills, and make connections through diverse internship experiences.
howToGetIt: Please complete the General Interest Form: https://enterpriseforyouth.formstack.com/forms/efyinterest Eligibility Requirements: Please note: Those who have taken our Job Readiness Training will be favored in our internship program applications. This is a professional commitment. It is important that you are able to commit to all requirements fully. Interns are expected to work between 60 – 75 hours AND attend weekly advisory sessions at SPUR (654 Mission St.). PLEASE Keep in mind: They have limited internship opportunities and cannot guarantee a placement to everyone who applies. They will prioritize applicants who have completed our Job Readiness Training and who have an updated resume. They cannot offer you an internship if you have schedule conflicts.
